actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.
Committee on Commerce. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Commerce. Reported to Senate by Senator McCain with an amendment. With written report No. 105-316.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 555.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel FOILCAT.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade. Makes such certificate effective on the date on which the vessel is placed in service to initiate a high-speed marine ferry demonstration project through the last day of the 36th month beginning after such effective date.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel FOILCAT.
